column4: Can someone help me with chmod and chown? I have screwed up things a bit.
-.- crap, my install took AGES because of my Fake_RAID
there are ways, but reinstalling is much faster
what do you want to do exactly?
there's no such service as xxxx
if you just want documentation on upstart, I can give you that.   If you are trying to accomplish something specific, then just tell us what it is...
sigh... use update-rc.d then (though you were never supposed to use that as a user.  You're supposed to use something like sysv-rc-conf)
because you aren't tell us what you are actually doing.
you don't have to do anything if you just edited the contents of the file, they are just symlinks
I downloaded it from a website
